org.melior.client.web.rest

Class RestClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.melior.client.web.rest.RestClientBuilder

  • public class RestClientBuilder
extends Object
    Convenience class for building a RestClient. Provides switches for media type, authentication and secure connections.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Melior
